summary: This document is an email from Jes Staley to an email address associated with vacation planning. It mentions a visit from Peter Mandelson to New York and requests confidential treatment from JPMorgan Chase. The context suggests a connection to high-profile individuals and potential discussions of significance.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the sender of the email discussing a visit from Peter Mandelson.

persons.name: Peter Mandelson
persons.context: Peter Mandelson is mentioned as coming to New York, indicating a potential meeting or event.

keyFacts: Jes Staley is reaching out regarding Peter Mandelson's visit to New York.
Confidential treatment is requested by JPMorgan Chase in relation to the email content.
